Name: Pattern Recognition - PE

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Probably we need to fill some example data? Not specified exact rules. Probably we can propose typical attributes like support=1.0 confidence=0.9 etc. Provide dictionary with those top-level keys containing nested dicts mapping activity to {support: ..., confidence: ...}.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For other keys list activities maybe empty? Or also some example? The scenario likely expects to illustrate that we can create such structure, maybe fill with sample values.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Well construct nested dicts: existence = {Idea Generation (IG): {support: 1.0, confidence: 1.0}, ...} absence = {} maybe empty. exactly_one = {}. init = {Idea Generation (IG): {support: 1.0, confidence: 1.0}}.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - NE
